channel.title: Home on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Disciplines of Web Developing
item.description: From my experience working on Web, there are four elements of building web: Databases management, Back end services, front end functionality and front end designer. To be a competent developer, one must cover all of those fields; to be a successful developer, on must cover all of those fields and have deep knowledge in one of them.

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Finally, I got myself a personal blog/website using Hugo Framework. It’s been a litle bit time consuming to setting up, but oh boy isn’t it look nice. I’ve always wanted to have a personal blog, but not until recently , I realized that I truly want to have a blog. Last year, I made a website for the sole purpose of getting to employer’s eyes and it didn’t get me far.
